item.description:
Don't miss out on this FANTASTIC three day holiday weekend trip to an all-inclusive Resort in the beautiful Berkshire Mountains of Kent, Connecticut.

Only 90 minutes from Hartford, they offer almost every sport/activity you can imagine including: Tennis, Mt. Biking, Water Skiing, Volleyball, Archery, Zip Line, Rock Climbing Wall, Yoga, Wine Tasting, Arts and Crafts, Softball, Dodgeball and the Flying Trapeze just to name a few!!

ALL MEALS, ACTIVITIES, EQUIPMENT, INSTRUCTIONS AND ENTERTAINMENT ARE INCLUDED IN THE PRICE AS WELL AS OVERNIGHT ACCOMMODATIONS AND UNLIMITED WINE WITH DINNER!! There are tons of activities to choose from, entertainment/shows at night, dancing in the club house and even a midnight bonfire!

This all-inclusive weekend begins at 5:30 p.m. on Friday, September 4th and the party continues through Monday, September 7th at 4:00 p.m.

Do more in a weekend than most people do all summer! Enjoy your favorite sports, activities and adventures... try something new... kick back and socialize... celebrate with great food and parties... or simply relax and rediscover yourself and become part of a fun-loving, adventure-seeking community.

SAY YOU'RE WITH ADVENTURES IN TRAVEL, SPORTS AND DINING AND SAVE $50!! I've arranged a special discounted price of $480.00 which includes absolutely EVERYTHING! Price is based on 4 people/cabin. Regular price is $540.00. ($459 + tax/service fee).


~ Payment is due ASAP! ~


Click on this link for more information and to make payment:
http://clubgetaway.co...

Terms and conditions of your Reservation:

* Prices per person based on four people per cabin (Roommate match-up is available).

* If you prefer less people to a room: Add $15 per person per night for triple occupancy. Add $25 per person per night double occupancy.

* Cancellation Policy: Full refund up to 7 days before vacation less $10 cancellation fee. Up to 72 hours prior to departure $50 cancellation fee. No refunds thereafter.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll give my cell phone # to anyone that signs up
item.name: Labor Day Sports & Adventure Weekend (9/4/09 - 9/7/09)
